headline: Corteva Announces Pricing of Senior Notes Offering
summary: INDIANAPOLIS, May 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Corteva, Inc. today announced the pricing of a public offering by its direct subsidiary, EIDP, Inc. of $500 million principal amount of its 5.125% Senior...
